attributes.action: Stop pay for all members of parliament until Brexit has been delivered Leave EU.
attributes.background:
As per the democratic vote in 2016 to leave the EU. We were promised a date in 2019 to leave the EU.
The deadline for this has now come and gone several times. If this was a business transaction there would have been penalties for this delay.
Stop parliamentarians pay until resolved

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
